activities: Internal business purposes (i.e., financial, operational, IT, employment, benefits and human resources)
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Poland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Information about employees (i.e., name, title, phone number, compensation, benefits and other personal information
recoursemech: Consistent with its Safe Harbor Policy, Leggett will employ the following dispute resolution mechanisms.  For disputes involving personal information received from Switzerland, Leggett agrees to cooperate with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).  For disputes involving employment-related personal information received from the EEA, Leggett agrees to cooperate with EEA data protection authorities and to participate in dispute resolution through the panel established by the European Data Authorities.  For all other disputes involving information received from the EEA, Leggett participates in the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program.
